short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove click to edit on jira

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jira has a feature called click-to-edit.
This feature can not be disabled by user.
So this extension will disable the feature, in case you want to edit, please hold Ctrl while double click.
